definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The tin case dented when it was dropped on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 馬口鐵罐頭掉在地板上摔癟了。

sentences.english: And instead of tin, he went with plastic.
sentences.chinese: 而且他用塑料替代了原先的馬口鐵。

sentences.english: The company's long-term inventory of various specifications of tinplate , .
sentences.chinese: 本公司長期庫存各種規格馬口鐵，。

sentences.english: An appliance for opening tin cans.
My company specialized in tinplate packaging products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司專業從事馬口鐵包裝產品。

sentences.english: The instrument for automatically determinig tin coating weight of tinplate hasbeen developed.
sentences.chinese: 根據電解剝離原理，研製出馬口鐵鍍錫量自動測量儀。
